showScoreExcerpt:
“It is unfortunate that, while his choreography is energetic and enjoyable, Warren Carlyle’s direction fails to find much subtext for the actors. Everyone seems to be saying and singing exactly what they feel. It makes for a flat theatrical experience. And when there is dramatic movement, it feels artificial.”

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: It makes for a flat theatrical experience.
